column5: I just down loaded the software for the Magellan Map Send TOPO.  I cant or dont know how to get it to scale to show elevation and small lakes.  Can anyone help.  Remember Im new to this.  Thanks  Rob  One last thing, I bought this strickly so I can map from a PC vice the GPS

I'm not sure about your program but on the Garmin Topo I use there is a detail setting. If it's set low then you loose the contours and alot of other little things. I usually run mine on the highest detail setting and it works well. So have a look in the tool bar up top for a detail or somehting else along that line to adjust it.  Good Luck.
yup, check the map detail setting.
Im interested on how it is.Details to lakes more then anything.I was told it was not worth buying.  Look forwrd to your feed back.
